sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At  AlgoFurnish for Every Room, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website, make a purchase, or interact with our services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal Details: Name, email, phone number, shipping and billing addresses.
Payment Information: Collected securely via third-party payment gateways; we do not store card details.
Usage Data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and interaction data to improve website performance and user experience.
Communication Data: Messages sent through contact forms, email inquiries, or customer service interactions.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Communicate order updates or respond to queries
Improve our website and shopping experience
Send promotional offers (only with your consent)

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze traffic. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

sections.title: Sharing Your Information
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with trusted service providers (e.g., delivery partners, payment processors) who assist in fulfilling your orders.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.

sections.title: Your Rights
content: Access or correct your personal information
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention)
Opt out of marketing communications at any time

sections.title: Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices and encourage you to review their policies separately.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date.
